name: Avirtual
tagline: YOUR VIRTUAL PA CAN DO SO MANY THINGS.
description:
Welcome to AVirtual, a company that supplies highly talented personal assistants to professionals, small teams and entrepreneurs; Virtually! Our virtual PA’s are of the highest caliber, we personally handpick, interview and identity check every assistant ensuring the highest quality and integrity. Many have worked in the UK for high level CEO’s at companies like TUI, Google and BP.
All our Personal Assistants are employees (we don’t use freelancers) ensuring everyone at AVirtual shares our passion for hard work & quality as well as our commitment to loyalty & trust With an AVirtual PA you have no fixed salaries, no recruitment headaches, no employment legislation, no holiday or sickness costs, No Problems. And its all at a fraction of the cost of an in house PA. Prices start at 135GBP a month for 10 hours. There is no contract, you can cancel or change packages at anytime.
